creator: sip.sniffa@gmail.com
text: The URL for the log4j-user mail archive (under the table heading Archive) links to the developer mailing list (http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/logging-log4j-dev/) rather than the user mailing list (http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/logging-log4j-user/).

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: Committed against log4j source in rev 687385.  Will push to site with log4j 1.2.16 release.

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: *** Bug 46356 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
